I was in the Navy for six years as a
nuclear engineer and while I was
deployed out in the Pacific Ocean I was
actually programming this one game
empires mod and then when I got out of

developing an RF tracking system that'll

reality because of the simplicity of the
system you have a transmitting antenna
you have receiving antenna and you
measure the time of flight between the
two another thing is the signal can
travel through lots of materials so
we'll surround the environment with
those transmitters and then the players
will wear the receiver and the receiver
actually picks up all of the signals
coming from the transmitters and be from

time of flight
